wmndsHomepageBannerProps.name: titleText
wmndsHomepageBannerProps.description: Title text to use in the banner.

wmndsHomepageBannerProps.name: titleHTML
wmndsHomepageBannerProps.description: HTML title content to use in the banner. If titleText is provided, the titleHTML argument will be ignored.

wmndsHomepageBannerProps.name: image
wmndsHomepageBannerProps.description: Url for the image to be displayed in the banner.
